import { Component} from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-cambiar-fecha', templateUrl: './cambiar-fecha.component.html', styleUrls: ['./cambiar-fecha.component.css'] }) export class CambiarFechaComponent { isDisabled = true; buttonText = 'Modificar'; cambiarFecha() { this.isDisabled = !this.isDisabled; this.buttonText = this.isDisabled ? 'Modificar' : 'Guardar'; } }
